org.aavso.tools.vstar.ui.pane.plot
Class AbstractObservationPlotPane<T extends ObservationPlotModel>

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.aavso.tools.vstar.ui.pane.plot.AbstractObservationPlotPane<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, org.jfree.chart.ChartMouseListener, org.jfree.data.general.DatasetChangeListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ObservationAndMeanPlotPane, ObservationPlotPane
public abstract class AbstractObservationPlotPane<T extends ObservationPlotModel>
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements org.jfree.chart.ChartMouseListener, org.jfree.data.general.DatasetChangeListener

This class is the base class for chart panes containing a plot of a set of valid observations. It is genericised on observation model.

See Also:
Serialized Form

AbstractObservationPlotPane

public AbstractObservationPlotPane(java.lang.String title,
                                   java.lang.String subTitle,
                                   java.lang.String domainTitle,
                                   java.lang.String rangeTitle,
                                   T obsModel,
                                   java.awt.Dimension bounds)
Constructor

Parameters:
title - The title for the chart.
subTitle - The sub-title for the chart.
domainTitle - The domain title (e.g. Julian Date, phase).
rangeTitle - The range title (e.g. magnitude).
obsModel - The data model to plot.
bounds - The bounding box to which to set the chart's preferred size.

seriesVisibilityChange

protected boolean seriesVisibilityChange(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean> deltaMap)
Was there a change in the series visibility? Some callers may want to invoke this only for its side effects, while others may also want to know the result.

Parameters:
deltaMap - A mapping from series number to whether or not each series' visibility was changed.
Returns:
Was there a change in the visibility of any series?

datasetChanged

public void datasetChanged(org.jfree.data.general.DatasetChangeEvent event)
From DatasetChangeListener. When the dataset changes, e.g. series visibility, we want to set the appropriate magnitude value range, ignoring any series that is not visible. We also make sure that the loaded series colors are all set.

Specified by:
datasetChanged in interface org.jfree.data.general.DatasetChangeListener
